title: What is a relationship contract, and do you need one?
text: It starts by laying down a few simple guidelines. For instance, if your partner works overtime on most days, then you could lay down one rule of having breakfast together or going out on a date night once a fortnight. Or perhaps you want to lay down some housework responsibilities? Should you celebrate birthdays with family or should it be just the two of you? What are the things to share with family or things to not share with friends?All of these could easily help you avoid conflicts or uncomfortable situations later on. Also, remember things that are trivial for one could be of extreme importance to the other. For instance, if being together for New Year was important for your partner and due to a work deadline you had to cancel it, then you know you have to make it up to your partner as it was something that was important for them.
description: In the volatile world of today, relationship contracts help one to understand one’s partner & bring in more transparency & smoothness in one’s relationship.
